data.title: Beverly Hills: The First 100 Years
data.meta_description: This lavishly-illustrated coffee table book by author and historian Robert "Robbie" Anderson honors Beverly Hills, famous for its movie stars and glamorous estates, its lush gardens and glorious weather. This volume boasts hundreds of rare photographs and fascinating stories from the autho
data.text: USER TIPS: To turn pages, click and drag them. You can also use the page turn tabs next to the book, click the buttons in the toolbar below, or use the scroll wheel on your mouse. Double-click on the book to zoom in and out, or tap the magnifying glass in the toolbar (above left). You can find specific content with the search box in the upper right-hand corner. Use the buttons on the left side of the tool bar (above) to display book page thumbnails, review the table of contents, activate the auto-play feature, and select fullscreen view.
